text: The following is a list of burial places of Ottoman sultans in Istanbul, Turkey. {|class="wikitable sortable" |- !Sultan !Reigned !Burial place !Location !class="unsortable" |Image |- |Bayezid II ||1481–1512 |Tomb of Bayezid II |Beyazıt Square, Fatih, Istanbul | |- |Selim I ||1512–1520 |Tomb of Selim I |Çarşamba, Fatih, Istanbul | |- |Suleiman I ||1520–1566 |rowspan=3 |Tomb of Suleiman I |rowspan=3 |Süleymaniye, Fatih, Istanbul |rowspan=3 |100px |- |Suleiman II ||1687–1691 |- |Ahmed II ||1691–1695 |- |Ahmed I ||1603–1617 |rowspan=3 |Tomb of Ahmed I |rowspan=3 |Sultanahmet, Fatih, Istanbul |rowspan=3 |100px |- |Murad IV ||1623–1640 |- |Osman II ||1618–1622 |- |Mehmed IV ||1648–1687 |rowspan=5 |Tomb of Turhan Sultan |rowspan=5 |Eminönü Fatlh, Istanbul |rowspan=5 |100px |- |Mustafa II ||1695–1703 |- |Ahmed III ||1703–1730 |- |Mahmud I ||1730–1754 |- |Osman III ||1754–1757 |- |Mustafa III ||1757–1773 |rowspan=2 |Tomb of Mustafa III |rowspan=2 |Laleli, Fatih, Istanbul |rowspan=2 |100px |- |Selim II ||1566–1574 |- |Abdul Hamid I ||1773–1789 |rowspan=2 |Tomb of Abdul Hamid I |rowspan=2 |Eminönü, Fatih Istanbul |rowspan=2 |100px |- |Mustafa IV ||1807–1808 |- |Mahmud II ||1808–1839 |rowspan=3 |Tomb of Mahmud II |rowspan=3 |Çemberlitaş, Fatih, Istanbul |rowspan=3 |100px |- |Abdülaziz ||1861–1876 |- |Abdul Hamid II ||1876–1909 |- |Abdulmejid I ||1839–1861 |Tomb of Abdulmejid I |Fatih, Istanbul | |- |Murad V ||1876 |Tomb of Cedid Havatin |Eminönü, Fatih, Istanbul | |- |Mehmed V ||1909–1918 |Tomb of Mehmed Reşat |Eyüp, Istanbul |100px |} ==References== * Burial places Ottoman sultans Category:Burials in Turkey Category:Lists of tombs Burial places
title: List of burial places of Ottoman sultans
